meanings: skin; (나무의) bark; (바나나·양파 등의) peel; (멜론처럼 단단한) rind, zest; (곡류의) husk; (견과·달걀·조개 등의) shell
the rind of an apple[a watermelon]

vlive.korean: "포도껍질 먹어요?" "Do you eat grape skin"? 듣기 View video NCT : 런쥔이퇴근길!!💚
아이! 계란 껍질이 들어갔어! Hey! There's an eggshell in here! 듣기 View video Dingo Freestyle / 딩고프리스타일 : [영리한 문제아들] EP.05 힙합은 어린애들만 듣는다고?
vlive.english: Hey! There's an eggshell in here!

vlive.korean: 전 계란껍질 못 깔 뿐 요리... I might not be good at peeling eggs but... 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 막내의 사생활 23 (생일 기념❤)🦊
vlive.english: I might not be good at peeling eggs but...

vlive.korean: 진짜? - 그냥 먹어요? 껍질채? Really? - We can eat this without peeling? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [VPICK! HOW TO in V] 용희진영의 탕후루🍭🍡 (HOW TO COOK YONGHEE&JINYOUNG’s Tanghulu)
vlive.english: Really? - We can eat this without peeling?

vlive.korean: 깜짝이야! - 뭐야! - 껍질을 왜 먹어? Scared me! - What? - Why do you eat the skin? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 산을 넘어 산호세로 ~~❤
vlive.english: Scared me! - What? - Why do you eat the skin?

examples.korean: Will you peel the potatoes for me? 발음듣기 감자 껍질 좀 벗겨 주겠니? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Will you peel the potatoes for me? 발음

examples.korean: The reptile’s skin is tough and scaly. 발음듣기 파충류의 껍질은 단단하고 비늘이 나 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The reptile’s skin is tough and scaly. 발음

examples.korean: First, pare the rind from the lemon. 발음듣기 먼저, 레몬의 껍질을 벗기세요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: First, pare the rind from the lemon. 발음

examples.korean: Deer had stripped all the bark off the tree. 발음듣기 사슴들이 그 나무의 껍질을 다 벗겨 놓은 상태였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Deer had stripped all the bark off the tree. 발음

examples.korean: You’ll need four ripe tomatoes, skinned and chopped. 발음듣기 껍질을 벗겨 다져 놓은, 잘 익은 토마토 네 개가 필요하다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You’ll need four ripe tomatoes, skinned and chopped. 발음
